hero.title: Kitsune
hero.subtitle: The intelligent booking platform built for Asia. Powered by LINE integration, designed for simplicity, packed with analytics.

lineIntegration.title: Powered by LINE
lineIntegration.description: Reach customers where they already are. LINE is Asia's #1 messaging platform with over 95 million active users across Japan, Thailand, and Taiwan.

benefits.instantConfirmations: Instant booking confirmations via LINE chat
benefits.beautifulCards: Beautiful LINE cards showcase your services

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Built for business owners who want powerful features without the complexity

quickSetup.title: 5-Minute Setup
quickSetup.description: Go live in minutes with our guided setup wizard. No technical skills required.

qrCodes.title: Branded QR Codes
qrCodes.description: Generate beautiful QR codes with your logo. Print or share instantly.

analytics.title: Powerful Analytics
analytics.description: Track bookings, revenue, and customer trends with real-time dashboards.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Manage staff availability, business hours, and holidays effortlessly.

customForms.title: Custom Forms
customForms.description: Collect any information you need with drag-and-drop form builder.

autoReminders.title: Auto Reminders
autoReminders.description: Reduce no-shows with automatic booking reminders via LINE.

analyticsPreview.title: Analytics That Matter
analyticsPreview.description: See your business performance at a glance. Track bookings, identify your best customers, and make data-driven decisions.

qrCodeFeature.title: Scan. Book. Done.
qrCodeFeature.description: Generate beautiful, branded QR codes in seconds. Customers scan, add your LINE bot, and book instantly. No app downloads required.

customize.title: Customize Your QR Code
customize.description: Add your logo and brand colors

share.title: Print or Share
share.description: Display at your location or post online

screenshots.title: See Kitsune in Action
screenshots.subtitle: Explore the intuitive interface designed to make booking management effortless

dashboard.title: Powerful Dashboard
dashboard.description: Get instant insights into your business performance. Track bookings, monitor revenue, identify top customers, and make data-driven decisions with real-time analytics at your fingertips.

calendar.title: Smart Calendar Management
calendar.description: Visualize your schedule with ease. Multi-view calendar supports day, week, month, and agenda views. Filter by staff, service, or status. Color-coded bookings help you stay organized.

lineIntegration.title: Seamless LINE Integration
lineIntegration.description: Your customers book directly through LINE - Asia's favorite messaging app. Automatic confirmations, reminders, and updates keep everyone informed without any extra effort.

qrAndForms.title: Beautiful QR Codes & Custom Forms
qrAndForms.description: Generate branded QR codes in seconds. Customize with your logo and colors, then download or print. Build custom booking forms with drag-and-drop simplicity. Customers scan and book instantly - no app downloads required.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Bookings?
finalCta.description: Join hundreds of businesses using Kitsune to streamline their booking process and delight their customers.

footer.tagline: The intelligent booking platform for modern businesses in Asia. LINE-powered scheduling made simple.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Kitsune. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for Asian businesses.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question or need help? We'd love to hear from you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how the Company collects, uses, discloses, and safeguards your information when you use our LINE-based booking platform.
privacy.jurisdiction: This Privacy Policy applies to users in the United States and complies with applicable U.S. state privacy laws including but not limited to the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA), and other state privacy regulations enacted in 2025.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, information we obtain automatically when you use our services, and information from third-party sources.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
items: Name and contact information
LINE user ID and profile information
Business registration information (for business accounts)
Booking and appointment details
Payment and billing information
Communications with us

automaticInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Device information (type, operating system, browser)
IP address and geolocation data
Usage data and analytics
Cookies and similar tracking technologies
QR code scan data and timestamps

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Information
items: LINE Corporation (user profile, messaging data)
Payment processors (transaction data)
Analytics providers (usage statistics)

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
items: Provide, operate, and maintain our booking platform
Process appointments and bookings through LINE bot
Send booking confirmations and reminders via LINE messaging
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
Analyze usage patterns and improve our services
Send administrative information and service updates
Detect, prevent, and address technical issues or fraud
Comply with legal obligations

dataSharing.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
dataSharing.intro: We may share your information with the following third parties:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.description: We share data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform:
items: LINE Corporation - for messaging and bot services
Neon PostgreSQL - for database hosting
Cloudflare R2 - for file storage (logos, QR codes)
Vercel - for hosting and infrastructure
Stripe - for payment processing
Analytics providers - for service improvement

businessTransfers.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfers.description: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or governmental request, or to protect our rights, property, or safety.

withConsent.title: With Your Consent
withConsent.description: We may share your information for other purposes with your explicit consent.

noSale.title: We Do Not Sell Your Personal Information
noSale.description: The Company does not sell your personal information to third parties for monetary consideration.

yourRights.title: 4. Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location in the United States, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:

rights.title: Right to Know
rights.description: You have the right to request information about the personal data we have collected about you, including categories of data, sources, purposes, and third parties we share it with.

rights.title: Right to Access
rights.description: You can request a copy of your personal information that we maintain.

rights.title: Right to Correct
rights.description: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal information.

rights.title: Right to Delete
rights.description: You can request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.

rights.title: Right to Opt-Out
rights.description: You have the right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell your data), targeted advertising, and certain automated decision-making.

rights.title: Right to Non-Discrimination
rights.description: We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your privacy rights.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.description: To exercise these rights, you may contact us through your business dashboard settings or by using the LINE bot. We will respond to your request within the timeframes required by applicable law.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Regular security assessments and audits
Access controls and authentication measures
Employee training on data protection
Incident response and breach notification procedures
dataSecurity.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Specific retention periods include:
items: Booking data: Retained for 3 years after the appointment date for business records
Business account data: Retained for the duration of your active subscription plus 1 year
LINE user data: Retained until you unfriend the bot or request deletion
Payment records: Retained for 7 years to comply with tax and accounting requirements
Marketing communications: Retained until you opt-out or request deletion

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. These include:

types.title: Essential Cookies
types.description: Required for the platform to function properly (session management, authentication).

types.title: Analytics Cookies
types.description: Help us understand how users interact with our platform to improve services.

types.title: Geolocation Data
types.description: We use Vercel Geo detection to automatically detect your region and provide localized content.

types.title: Preference Cookies
types.description: Remember your language and display preferences.

cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may limit platform functionality.

international.title: 8. International Data Transfers
international.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. When we transfer data internationally, we implement appropriate safeguards such as:
items: Standard Contractual Clauses with service providers
Ensuring service providers maintain appropriate security measures
Complying with applicable cross-border data transfer regulations

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 10. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our platform integrates with third-party services, particularly LINE Corporation. Your use of LINE and interactions with the LINE bot are subject to LINE's own privacy policy and terms of service. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on our platform and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, wish to exercise your privacy rights, or have concerns about how we handle your personal information, please contact us through:
methods: The contact form available on our platform
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days, or as otherwise required by applicable law.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our LINE-based booking platform. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.acceptance: By creating an account or using our platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

items.service: 'Service' or 'Platform' refers to the Kitsune LINE-based booking system, including the web dashboard, LINE bot, and all related services.
items.company: 'Company,' 'we,' 'us,' or 'our' refers to the operator of the Kitsune platform.
items.user: 'You,' 'your,' or 'User' refers to the business entity or individual accessing our services.
items.customer: 'Customer' or 'End User' refers to individuals who make bookings through your LINE bot.
items.content: 'Content' refers to all information, data, text, software, graphics, or other materials.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.description: The Company provides a LINE bot-based appointment booking platform that enables businesses to:
features: Accept bookings through LINE messaging platform
Generate branded QR codes for customer acquisition
Send automated confirmations and reminders via LINE
Process payments through integrated payment processors
Customize booking forms and service offerings
serviceDescription.availability: The Service is provided 'as is' and 'as available.' We do not guarantee uninterrupted access and reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service with reasonable notice.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility and Account Registration

requirements.title: Eligibility Requirements
items: You must be at least 18 years old
You must have legal authority to enter into contracts
You must operate a legitimate business
You must comply with LINE's Official Account Terms of Service
You must not be located in sanctioned countries or prohibited from using our services

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.description: When creating an account, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain and update your account information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

eligibility.termination: We reserve the right to refuse service or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use Policy

permitted.title: Permitted Uses
permitted.description: You may use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe upon intellectual property rights of others
Transmit spam, malware, or harmful code
Harass, abuse, or harm others through the LINE bot
Impersonate any person or entity
Create false or fraudulent bookings
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service
Use the Service for illegal activities
Violate LINE's Terms of Service or Messaging API terms
Scrape, data mine, or harvest user information
Resell or redistribute the Service without authorization
Use the Service to compete with the Company

acceptableUse.enforcement: Violation of this Acceptable Use Policy may result in immediate account termination and legal action.

lineTerms.title: LINE Compliance
lineTerms.description: Your use of our Service requires integration with LINE Corporation's services. You acknowledge and agree that:
items: You must comply with LINE's Official Account Terms of Service
LINE has its own privacy policy and terms that govern your use of LINE
The Company is not responsible for LINE's service availability or performance
LINE may impose rate limits, quotas, or restrictions on API usage
Changes to LINE's policies or APIs may affect Service functionality

limitations.title: Service Limitations
items: Message delivery rates are subject to LINE's infrastructure and policies
The Company does not guarantee 100% message delivery
LINE may block or filter certain types of messages
Service interruptions may occur due to LINE maintenance or outages

thirdParty.title: Other Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: Our Service integrates with payment processors (Stripe), hosting providers (Vercel), and other third parties. Your use of these services is subject to their respective terms and conditions.

pricing.title: Subscription Pricing
pricing.description: Access to the Service requires a paid subscription. Pricing information is available on our platform and may vary by region (USD, TWD, JPY).

billing.title: Billing
items: Subscriptions are billed on a monthly or annual basis
Payment is processed through Stripe or other authorized payment processors
You authorize us to charge your payment method for recurring fees
All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes, which you are responsible for
Prices may change with 30 days' notice

freeTrial.title: Free Trial
freeTrial.description: We may offer a free trial period. If you do not cancel before the trial ends, your payment method will be charged the subscription fee. Trial terms may vary and are subject to change.

refunds.title: Refunds and Cancellations
items: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your dashboard
Cancellations take effect at the end of the current billing period
No refunds are provided for partial months or unused services
Refunds may be provided at our discretion for service outages or errors

ownership.title: Company Ownership
ownership.description: The Company retains all rights, title, and interest in the Service, including:
items: Platform source code and software
Trademarks, logos, and branding
Documentation and user interfaces
Proprietary algorithms and technologies

userContent.title: Your Content
userContent.description: You retain ownership of content you upload to the Service (business logos, service descriptions, booking forms, etc.). By using the Service, you grant us a limited license to use, store, and display your content solely to provide the Service.

lineTrademarks.title: LINE Trademarks
lineTrademarks.description: LINE, LINE Official Account, and related trademarks are property of LINE Corporation. Use of LINE trademarks must comply with LINE's brand guidelines.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: If you provide feedback or suggestions about the Service, we may use that feedback without any obligation to you.

customerData.title: Customer Data
customerData.description: You retain ownership of your customers' booking data and personal information. The Company acts as a data processor on your behalf. You are responsible for:
items: Obtaining proper consent from your customers
Complying with applicable privacy laws
Maintaining your own privacy policy
Responding to customer data requests
Ensuring lawful processing of personal data

companyData.title: Aggregated Data
companyData.description: We may collect and use aggregated, anonymized data for analytics, service improvement, and business purposes. This data does not identify individual businesses or customers.

dataPortability.title: Data Portability
dataPortability.description: Upon request, we will provide your data in a commonly used format. Upon account termination, we will delete your data according to our data retention policy, except where we are required to retain it by law.

disclaimer.title: No Warranties
disclaimer.description: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:
items: WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT
WARRANTIES OF UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE SERVICE
WARRANTIES REGARDING ACCURACY, RELIABILITY, OR COMPLETENESS

lineDisclaimer.title: LINE Service Disclaimer
lineDisclaimer.description: We do not guarantee LINE API availability, message delivery rates, or LINE service performance. Your use of LINE services is at your own risk.

results.title: Results Disclaimer
results.description: We do not guarantee specific results, revenue increases, or business outcomes from using the Service.

general.title: Limitation
general.description: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE COMPANY SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:
items: INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES
LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUE, DATA, OR BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES
DAMAGES ARISING FROM SERVICE INTERRUPTIONS OR ERRORS
DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIRD-PARTY SERVICES (INCLUDING LINE)
DAMAGES EXCEEDING THE AMOUNT YOU PAID TO US IN THE 12 MONTHS PRIOR TO THE CLAIM

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictional Variations
jurisdictions.description: Some jurisdictions do not allow certain limitations of liability. In such jurisdictions, our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Company, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses (including legal fees) arising from:
items: Your violation of these Terms
Your violation of any rights of another party
Your use of the Service
Your customer data or content
Your violation of applicable laws or regulations

byUser.title: Termination by You
byUser.description: You may terminate your account at any time by canceling your subscription through your dashboard. Your data will be deleted according to our retention policy.

byCompany.title: Termination by Company
byCompany.description: We may suspend or terminate your account immediately if:
items: You violate these Terms
Payment fails or subscription lapses
You engage in fraudulent or illegal activities
Your account poses security risks
We are required to do so by law

effect.title: Effect of Termination
items: Your access to the Service will cease immediately
Outstanding fees remain due and payable
Your data will be deleted according to our retention policy
Sections of these Terms that by nature should survive will remain in effect

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: For users in the United States, these Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to conflict of law principles.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: You agree to submit to the personal and exclusive jurisdiction of courts located in Delaware for resolution of disputes.

arbitration.title: Arbitration
arbitration.description: Disputes may be resolved through binding arbitration rather than in court, except you may assert claims in small claims court if they qualify. You waive any right to a jury trial.

classAction.title: Class Action Waiver
classAction.description: You agree to bring claims individually and waive any right to participate in class action lawsuits.

entire.title: Entire Agreement
entire.description: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and the Company regarding the Service.

amendments.title: Amendments
amendments.description: We may modify these Terms at any time by posting updated Terms on our platform. Material changes will be notified via email or dashboard notification. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

severability.title: Severability
severability.description: If any provision of these Terms is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in effect.

waiver.title: Waiver
waiver.description: Our failure to enforce any provision does not constitute a waiver of that provision.

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.description: You may not assign these Terms without our written consent. We may assign these Terms to any affiliate or successor.

notices.title: Notices
notices.description: We may provide notices through your dashboard, via LINE bot, or to the email address associated with your account.

forcemajeure.title: Force Majeure
forcemajeure.description: We are not liable for delays or failures due to causes beyond our reasonable control, including LINE service outages, natural disasters, or government actions.

contact.title: 15. Contact Information
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through:
